trans-unit.source: In order to deploy applications to Azure, you need an account.
trans-unit.target: In order to deploy applications to Azure, you need an account.

trans-unit.source: This article describes how to create a free trial account and how to enable Azure preview features, including BizTalk Services, HDInsight, and Azure Back, for the account.
trans-unit.target: This article describes how to create a free trial account and how to enable Azure preview features, including BizTalk Services, HDInsight, and Azure Back, for the account.

trans-unit.source: Open a web browser and browse to <http://azure.microsoft.com>
trans-unit.target: Open a web browser and browse to <http://azure.microsoft.com>

trans-unit.source: If you have an MSDN subscription, navigate to the [Azure Benefit for MSDN Subscribers](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits-details/) page and follow the steps to create an account by activating your MSDN subscriber benefits.
trans-unit.target: If you have an MSDN subscription, navigate to the [Azure Benefit for MSDN Subscribers](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/member-offers/msdn-benefits-details/) page and follow the steps to create an account by activating your MSDN subscriber benefits.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, navigate to the [create a free trial account](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) page and follow the steps to create a trial account.
trans-unit.target: Otherwise, navigate to the [create a free trial account](http://azure.microsoft.com/pricing/free-trial/) page and follow the steps to create a trial account.

trans-unit.source: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.
trans-unit.target: You'll need a credit card number and a mobile phone number for proof of identity, but you will not be billed.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to <https://account.windowsazure.com/> and sign in with your Azure account.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to <https://account.windowsazure.com/> and sign in with your Azure account.

trans-unit.source: Click **preview features** to view the available previews.
trans-unit.target: Click **preview features** to view the available previews.

trans-unit.source: Scroll down to the feature you want to enable and click **try it now**.
trans-unit.target: Scroll down to the feature you want to enable and click **try it now**.

trans-unit.source: Select your subscription and click the check.
trans-unit.target: Select your subscription and click the check.
